resources.string: Your BMI is in the ideal range. But that does not mean that you become complacent! Just keep doing what you have been. Go for a balanced diet, exercise regularly and enjoy life!

Gradual weight loss is recommended to maintain a healthy body weight. Even a small weight loss (just 10 percent of your current weight) will help to lower your risk of developing diseases associated with being overweight. So, why wait to maintain your weight? Manage a healthy body weight through exercise and eating right.

Try to eat more and eat the right kinds of nutritious foods as you are underweight. It may also be useful to visit your doctor for a regular health check-up. So, do not wait to maintain a healthy body weight. The BMI normal range is not applicable to pregnant and breast feeding mothers.
